mapper.select: select o.id ,o.door_id, d.name ,d.tel,o.order_no,o.order_type,o.person_num,o.cashier,o.create_time,o.end_time,o.payment_type,o.price,o.created,o.updated from (select id ,door_id, order_no,order_type,person_num,cashier,create_time,end_time,payment_type,price,created,updated from tb_order) o left join (select id ,name ,tel ,created ,updated from tb_door) d on o.door_id = d.id;

SELECT o.door_id,o.id, d.name AS door_name,d.tel, o.order_no,o.order_type,o.person_num,o.cashier,o.create_time,o.end_time,o.payment_type,o.price FROM (SELECT id,door_id,order_no,order_type,person_num,cashier,create_time,end_time,payment_type,price FROM tb_order where id=#{id}) o LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,NAME,tel FROM tb_door) d ON o.door_id=d.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order (order_no,door_id,order_type,person_num,cashier, create_time,end_time,payment_type,price, created,updated) VALUES (#{orderNo},#{door.id}, #{orderType},#{personNum},#{cashier}, #{createTime},#{endTime},#{paymentType},#{price}, #{created},#{updated} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_order SET door_id=#{door.id},order_no=#{orderNo},order_type=#{orderType}, person_num=#{personNum},cashier=#{cashier}, create_time=#{createTime},end_time=#{endTime}, payment_type=#{paymentType},price=#{price}, updated=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
